fileController.py module

fileController.delete_file(filename)

Delete an uploaded file.

This endpoint allows the deletion of an uploaded file by specifying its filename.

Parameters:

filename (str) – The name of the file to be deleted.

Returns:

JSON response indicating success or an error message.

Return type:

flask.Response

fileController.download_file(filename)

Download a file.

This endpoint allows users to download a previously uploaded file.

Parameters:

filename (str) – Name of the file to be downloaded.

Returns:

The file to be downloaded.

Return type:

flask.Response

fileController.upload_file()

Upload a file.

This endpoint allows users to upload a PDF file.

Returns:

JSON response indicating success or an error message.

Return type:

flask.Response
